name: Screen Off Lite
description: Screen Off app allows to lock the screen with 1 click. If your power button is broken, or difficult to reach, Screen Off Lite saves you.   Lite Features: - 8 Colorful Icons - 2 Lock Methods (works with Fingerprint lock) - No Advertisements, Well Designed, Customer Support   PRO Features:  - 16 Colorful Icons - 6 Screen Lock Sounds - 6 Screen Unlock Sounds - Floating Button over All Apps - Add Lock Icon to Notification Bar - 4 Languages Support - Widgets   Get PRO version from below Screen Off Pro  This app uses the Device Administrator permission. It is necessary to be able to turn off the screen.
